commitMessage:
@@@[CALCITE-1682] New metadata providers for expression column origin and all predicates in plan

Includes:
* RelNode type metadata provider
* Ranges containment-based simplification in conjunctive predicates
@@@[CALCITE-1731] Materialized view rewriting for join and aggregate operators

@@@[CALCITE-3421] Reuse RelMetadataQuery in test suites

Close #1513

@@@[CALCITE-3892] Make junit test classes and methods non-public where possible

Prior to junit 5.  classes and methods had to be public. This is no
longer the case.

Some classes need to remain public because they are referenced from
elsewhere.  or if they use reflection somehow. The remaining 'public'
keyword will be informative to maintainers.
